CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Toxic gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a potent nerve agent harmful to most complex forms of organic life.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Rage gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a specialized airbone agent that induces a blind, uncontrollable rage.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Tear gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a specialized airbone agent that attacks the sensitive membranes of the eyes and nose, making it difficult to see or breathe.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Sleep gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a powerful sedative, capable of knocking unconscious anyone exposed to it.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Fear gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a specialized airbone agent that induces an extremely strong feeling of dread and terror.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Corrosive gas
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with an extremely strong acid, capable of quickly burning flesh and metal alike.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Nanomachine
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Contains nanomachines designed to latch onto and wreck havoc on the systems of mechanoids. Ineffective against organic life.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: Insecticide
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Filled with a special aerosol designed to kill insectoids.
